SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Controller
Controller class that implements the IControllerForView interface.
DatabaseConnection
This class manages the database connection using JPA's EntityManager and EntityManagerFactory.
GUI
The main GUI class for the application.
IControllerForView
Interface defining the contract for the controller to interact with the view.
ImageAdder
Utility class for adding images to the application.
ImageHandling
This class handles image-related operations, including uploading images to an external API (ImgBB) and parsing the response to retrieve the image URL.
LoginSignupController
This is controller for the user registration and login.
Main
The entry point of the application.
MainScreenController
This class represents the main screen controller of the application.
Note
Represents a note entity in the database.
NoteAddController
This is controller for adding note
NoteDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing `Note` entities in the database.
NoteEditController
This is controller for the Editing note
NoteNode
Represents a UI component for displaying a note in the application.
NoteNodeBuilder
Utility class for building a list of NoteNode objects from a list of Note objects.
PopupWindow
Utility class for displaying popup windows in the application.
SceneManager
Global scene manager for handling screen changes based on the called FXML file.
SessionManager
This acts as Session storage for global saved values.
StartScreenController
This is a controller for startscreen of the application.
UiInterface
This is interface of the UI controllers.
User
Represents a user entity in the database.
UserDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing `User` entities in the database.
UserEditController
This is controller for user editing screen
